remarks: Show that two functions are inverse to each other by applying them twice to each value of their domains.  (Contributed by AV, 13-Dec-2019.)
statement:
2fvcoidd.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
2fvcoidd.g $e |- ( ph -> G : B --> A ) $.
2fvcoidd.i $e |- ( ph -> A. a e. A ( G ` ( F ` a ) ) = a ) $.
2fvidf1od.i $e |- ( ph -> A. b e. B ( F ` ( G ` b ) ) = b ) $.
2fvidinvd $p |- ( ph -> `' F = G ) $.
$d A a $.
$d B b $.
$d F a $.
$d F b $.
$d G a $.
$d G b $.
